features: HEALTHY, BEAUTIFUL SKIN: Our formula targets the look of dark spots and uneven texture, leaving the skin feeling softer, smoother and more balanced. Perfect for morning and nighttime use.

CLEAN SKIN, UNCLOGGED PORES: Remove dulling skin cells, dirt, makeup and environmental pollution with our deeply cleansing formula, both improving complexion and preparing the skin for optimal absorption of serums and facial treatments.

BIOCOMPATIBLE & SAFE: Naturium's skincare is formulated with both potent natural ingredients & advanced synthetic ingredients. They utilize efficacious levels of active ingredients, are pH level appropriate, & are thoroughly tested for safety.

CLEAN FORMULATION, NON-TOXIC: Cruelty free, paraben free, vegan, gluten free, fragrance free & non-toxic. Made with the highest-quality botanical, earth & marine-based ingredients combined with non-toxic-to-skin alternatives & advanced science.
NATURIUM'S QUALITY GUARANTEE: If for any reason you are not 100% satisfied, we offer a 30-day money-back refund. No questions asked!
body.description: Our essence-like cleanser is formulated with 3% niacinamide and works to gently dissolve makeup, oil and impurities, while improving the appearance of skin, for a healthier-looking complexion.What it does Gently dissolves impurities Leaves skin feeling soft & smooth Helps balance skin, leaving it feeling comfortable, not dry or stripped PH LEVEL:Formula pH Level: 5.50-6.50 Our mission is to create clinically-effective, affordable skin care formulated with both potent natural ingredients and advanced synthetic ingredients. Naturium products utilize efficacious levels of active ingredients, are pH level appropriate, and are thoroughly tested for safety. Patch test advised for all products prior to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful - skin has never been clearer
reviews.reviewText: Using this cleanser alongside an oil-based cleanser, hyaluronic acid, and a moisturizer has made my skin feel and look amazing. I’d attribute that mostly to this cleanser. Every time after using it my skin immediately looks fresher and a lot cleaner. It doesn’t have the best smell (smells quite clinical) but that’s ok when the ingredients work so well. Also the way it emulsifies in your hands when you rub it is very satisfying. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser paired with the ginseng balm is no kidding absolutely the best! I have been putting my skin through it for the past few years trying to find the perfect cleanse. I have cabinets and drawers full of skincare and it is all going in the trash. Every other cleanser leaves my skin red as soon as I wash it off, shoot sometimes during cleansing. My skin looked absolutely normal after the balm, and this cleanser was the icing on the cake. I followed up with a hydrating toner and the aquaphor stick with avocado oil in it, and my skin is soft like butter. Probably could have went without anything on it at all. Just buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good soap, pump should be better
reviews.reviewText: The product is good. I really like that cleans your make up and your face is not dried after. The only thing I notice is the pump after used the soap dries a bit so when you try to pump the soap again it doesn't come out on your hand it shoots away so you loose product and need to clean it every time so it comes straight down on your hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleanses Clean and Powerfully- Also Moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I've been really impressed with the Naturium Niacinamide Cleansing Gelée – the blend of 3% Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin C in this 7.1 oz bottle works wonders. It cleanses my skin gently, leaving it feeling super smooth and refreshed. Plus, the lightweight texture and lovely scent make washing my face a refreshing part of my daily routine. The one thing that is a tiny hassle is when I am in a rush and I have to wait 3-5 minutes for the cleansing to soak in. Other than that, there are no complaints. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for affordable, good quality skincare, and this brand has easily become one of my favorites! This cleanser feels super lightweight, but also extremely refreshing and all over clean. I have more dry skin, but it doesn't dry it out more. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t know what to expect, my 15 yr old daughter wanted this (she saw it on TikTok) so I ordered one for me and one for her, why not?! I am in love. Makes my face soft and I mean it gets the makeup off my face like nothing I’ve seen before. . Hate the smell but I don’t care it’s worth it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well for what it is I bought the small one at target and it worked and feels nice on face then I went and got this one. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this product before, it’s my go to face cleanser and works great but, it arrived with a broken pump and 1/4 of product missing
It does not sting the eyesDoes not strip the faceA little goes a long wayFast shipping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Super gentle on my skin but removes eye makeup
reviews.reviewText: I've been using it for about two weeks now and it seems to be lasting well (you can see in the image how much it's gone down), the bottle and pump are a lovely design and work well. The gel wash itself is very gentle on my skin but is enough to remove my heavy eyeliner and waterproof mascara which is great, but I wouldn't say there's been any noticeable difference to my skin since I switched to this from my previous cleanser but the packaging and ease of use definitely makes me more inclined to repurchase rather than go back to my old one.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love the texture and feel
reviews.reviewText: I simply love the texture which is cooling to the skin. I have combination skin and it feels clean and moisturised after each wash. Also a good second cleanse choice.
I haven't been disappointed yet with any naturium product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Basic and slightly drying.. can get many better cleansers for a third of the price
